content: after each gill/fin may also be helpful if you have trouble finding the back loops a note on shift stitches the start of the round will always shift gradually to the right or left if you crochet left handed when working in continuous rounds to keep the body symmetrical and prevent twisting this pattern requires a shift stitch every few rounds for me this is every 5th round and this is what is written in the pattern however your gauge yarn weight and hook size may mean you need to make a shift stitch more or less often i recommend that the first time you try this pattern you use a
